item.title: NEXTCLOUD DEBIAN SERVER AND CLIENT
item.author: hotspotcepeda@gmail.com (HotspotCepeda)
item.description: ADD NEXTCLOUD REPOSITORY Add the Nextcloud repository in the /etc/apt/sources.d/nextcloud.list 1 echo 'deb http://apt.jurisic.org/debian/ jessie main contrib non-free' >> /etc/apt/sources.list.d/nextcloud.list Install release key of Nextcloud repository: 1 wget -q http://apt.jurisic.org/Release.key -O- | apt-key add - And run apt-get update to download the list of packages. 1 apt-get update INSTALL NEXTCLOUD CLIENT Install Nextcloud server with: 1 apt-get install nextcloud-client INSTALL NEXTCLOUD SERVER
item.dc:creator: HotspotCepeda
